entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tisdale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
